titles.title: You May Have The Joy Bells

authors.author: J. Edward Ruark William J. Kirkpatrick

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Joy bells ringing in your heart!
Joy bells ringing in your heart!
Take the Savior here below

verse.name: c1b
v1a
verse.lines:
You may have the joy bells
Ringing in your heart,
And a peace that
From You never will depart.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Walk the straight and narrow way;
Live for Jesus ev'ry day.
He will keep the joy bells
Ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Love of Jesus in its fullness
You may know,
And this love to those around
You sweetly show.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Words of kindness always say;
Deeds of mercy do each day,
Then He'll keep the joy bells
Ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
You will meet with trials
As you journey home;
Grace sufficent He will give to overcome.
Tho' unseen by mortal eye,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
He is with you evernigh,
And He'll keep the joy bells
Ringing in your heart.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Let your life speak well
Of Jesus ev'ry day;
Own His right to ev'ry service
You can pay.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Sinners you can help to win
If your life is pure and clean,
And you keep the joy bells
Ringing in your heart.
